summary: Web application with authentication (login/logout) and admin dashboard. Working on UI improvements to make the logout button more visible with a dark color.
known_issues: Logout button not clearly visible - needs dark color styling

existing_features.title: Update the logout button/link in the Header component and LoginButton component to use a dark color (e.g., dark text or dark background) so it is clearly visible against the navigation bar background. Ensure the styling is consistent across both desktop and mobile nav layouts.

projectName: Make logout button clearly visible with dark color styling
